Title.text: Rule 42 Reversal (Input Goods & Input Services Finance Year Wise)
Rule 42 Reversal (Input Goods & Input Services Finance Wise)

Text.text: Exempted Turnover (Exempt supplies+ NIL Rated supplies + Reverse Charge supplies) divided by Total Turnover (Taxable Supplies + Exempt Supplies + NIL Rated Supplies), excluding NON GST supplies

Exempted Turnover (Exempt Supplies + NIL Rated Supplies + Reverse Charge supplies + NON-GST Supplies) divided by Total Turnover (Taxable Supplies + Exempt Supplies + NIL Rated Supplies + NON GST Supplies)
Exempted Turnover (Exempt supplies+ NIL Rated supplies + Reverse Charge supplies) divided by Total Turnover (Taxable Supplies + Exempt Supplies + NIL Rated Supplies), excluding NON GST supplies

Exempted Turnover (Exempt Supplies + NIL Rated Supplies + Reverse Charge supplies + NON-GST Supplies) divided by Total Turnover (Taxable Supplies + Exempt Supplies + NIL Rated Supplies + NON GST Supplies)
